pr_title: Switch to latest v5 release of release-drafter

timeline.message: Switch to latest v5 release of release-drafter

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  - uses: release-drafter/release-drafter@v5
          
          
            
                  - uses: release-drafter/release-drafter@v5.9.0
          
      
    
    
  

I think we would prefer the fixed version here 🙂
timeline.author: kiview
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,6 +9,6 @@ jobs:
   update_release_draft:
     runs-on: ubuntu-latest
     steps:
-      - uses: release-drafter/release-drafter@v5.2.0
+      - uses: release-drafter/release-drafter@v5

timeline.message:
fixed version for release-drafter
